articles.description: Rohan Kunnummal performed an iconic Virat Kohli celebration after reaching his ton during the Deodhar Trophy final. | Cricket
articles.content: South Zone defeated East Zone by 45 runs in the final of the Deodhar Trophy, at the CAP Siechem Ground in Thuthipet on Thursday. Defending a target of 329 runs, Mayank Agarwal-led South Zone bowled o… [+2126 chars]
